revision.text:
[[Image:Okres lucenec.png|thumb|right|300px|Location of Lučenec District in the [[Banská Bystrica Region]]]] '''Lupoč''' is a village and municipality in the [[Lučenec District]] in the [[Banská Bystrica Region]] of [[Slovakia]]. [[Image:Slovakiakrajenumbers.png|left|thumb|300px|6: Banská Bystrica Region in Slovakia]] [[Image:Lupoč - Zvonica v obci -.jpg|thumb|center|''Belfry in the village Lupoč'']]


{{commons category|Lupoč}} ==External links== *http://www.statistics.sk/mosmis/eng/run.html {{Lucenec District}} {{BanskáBystrica-geo-stub}} {{coord|48|22|N|19|33|E|region:SK_type:city|display=title}} [[Category:Villages and municipalities in Lučenec District]]
